Ice yai combine the brutality of [frost giants](/Monsters.aspx?ID=222) with the grace of martial artists. More than any other oni, ice yai delight not in the pleasures of the flesh, but in flesh itself—rather than indulging in oft-destructive mortal vices like drink or lust, ice yai pursue physical perfection, reveling in the process of turning their bodies into powerful fighting machines. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 31 **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 31 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 [Ice Yai](/Monsters.aspx?ID=747) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 189 2.0 **Perception** +26; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +24, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +5 **Int** +4 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +8 --- **AC** 34 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +25 **Will** +23 +1 status on all saves vs. magic **HP** 230 , regeneration 15 (deactivated by acid or fire) **Immunities** cold **Weaknesses** fire 15 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Icy Deflection** **Trigger** The ice yai is targeted by a ranged Strike or spell attack roll that doesn't have the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) trait; **Effect** The ice yai creates a reflective blockade of ice, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack roll. If the attack misses, the ice yai redirects the attack to another creature within 20 feet of the yai. The attacker rerolls the attack roll against the new target. --- **Speed** 40 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** fist +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+16 bludgeoning plus 2d6 cold and frozen strike **Ranged** ice missile +25 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d10+12 cold and frozen strike **Primal Innate Spells** DC 33 - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will, self only) - **4th** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (×3), [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129), [Solid Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=290) - **6th** [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47) (×3) - **7th** [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The ice yai takes on the appearance of a frost giant. This doesn't change their Speed or Strike attack and damage. **Double Punch** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The ice yai makes two fist Strikes. **Frozen Strike** On a critical hit with a fist Strike or a hit with an ice missile Strike, the target creature must attempt a DC 33 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is slowed 1 for 1 round.
**Failure** The creature is slowed 2 for 1 round.
**Critical Failure** The creature is slowed 3 for 1 round.
name: Ice Yai
